attributes.action: Make disproportionate tactics used by the police during peaceful demonstrations illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rioting by a crowd is a criminal offense in this country, but what about riots that are started by the police force, like those that took place on the 1st and 2nd of April in connection with the G2o summit? Shouldn't aggressive, and totally disproportionate tactics used by the police also be made illegal? 

The police are supposed to protect the rights of the general public, it is high time we saw them prove that they are willing to help protect our right to protest, because after all we do live in a democracy, don't we?
